body: Don’t we all want our very own “older girlfriend”? 😏

It is so good to find a doujin where the heroine enjoys the sex and wants more.
Most of the H-Doujins draws the girls with painful face.

In the raw at the last page she really said "Toshiue no kanojo" (Older girlfriend) but she said it ironically 
in the sense that she's happy being called her son's older girlfriend and then says "Visit your parent's house/jikka (visit me) sometimes. So yeah {~'-'}~
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i am not sorry .

LOL did the translators replace "mom" with "older girlfriend"? 
There are so so few doujins with a hot MILF's (one's that don't have ginormous boobs). People always equate a MILF with having gigantic boobs.
This is the Mom Version: https://nhentai.net/g/298585/
Pretty sure she is. Otherwise the "secretly have sex indoor" doesnt make much sense. And that would also explain his paranoid of someone finding them out.

Without the tags I may have never known that's his mom.

Is she though?
